list_variables.description: One or more managed policy ARNs to attach to this role.
list_variables.name: ManagedPolicyArns

list_variables.description: The policies to associate with this role. Policies can also be specified                   externally. For sample templates that demonstrates both embedded and external                   policies, see Template                      Examples.
list_variables.name: Policies

variables.description: The IAM assume role policy that is associated with this role.
variables.name: AssumeRolePolicyDocument

variables.description: The path associated with this role. For information about IAM paths, see                      Friendly Names and Paths in                   IAM User Guide.
variables.name: Path

variables.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the instance profile. For example:
variables.name: Arn
